CustomField.description: This field is optional and is manually populated. This field indicates if the statistic should also be stored on the parent object in addition to being stored in the LLC_BI__Statistic__c object. If the field is not specified, it defaults to FALSE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines if the value should be posted to the owning object or just posted to the statistics table.
CustomField.label: Post to Parent Object
